roleset_name: surgical procedure that mechanically widens a narrowed or obstructed blood vessel

roles.descr: angioplastied entity (blood vessel, lesion, stenosis, etc.)
roles.descr_trans: 血管成形实体（血管、病变、狭窄等）

roles.descr: location (heart, extremities, e.g.), if in addition to ARG1
roles.descr_trans: 位置（心脏、四肢等），如果除了 ARG1 之外

roleset_name_trans: 以机械方式扩张狭窄或阻塞血管的外科手术
